mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum rn FROM( SELECT pro_code code, nvl(pro_title, ' ') title, nvl(CATE_TITLE, ' ') category, nvl(pro_target, 0) targetFunding, nvl(PRO_FINISH_DATE, current_date)-current_date restDay, nvl(PRO_IMAGE, ' ') image, nvl(pro_curr, '정지') pro_curr, nvl(PRO_MONEY, 0) currentFunding FROM project WHERE PRO_FINISH_DATE>current_date and pro_curr='정상' AND PRO_SUB_DATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY PRO_FINISH_DATE ASC) a WHERE rownum<=#{end}) WHERE rn>${start}
